title: Start Date/Time
description: A starting date and time for an entity, event, etc. (as a Unix timestamp, e.g., 1651848477)

metadata.purpose: A starting date and time for an entity (founding date, birth date), event, etc. To specify just the year, assume a date of 1 January at the beginning of the day (e.g., 1672531200 for Sun 01 Jan 2023 00:00:00 GMT+0000).
